main.name: Arshika Lalan
main.description: God has not promised Skies always blue,  Flower-strewn pathways   All our life through;   God has not promised Sun without rain,  Joy without sorrow,  Peace without pain.”  ― A.P.J. Abdul Kalam, Wings of Fire
main.designation: Deep Learning and Machine Learning Enthusiast | React.js Web Developer
main.bio: I am a B.E. Computer Science and MSc. Economics double major at BITS Pilani, Goa campus. I am a Deep Learning and Machine Learning enthusiast, who loves to experiment and explore new ideas. I love maths, econometrics and statistics. I also love to work on web development using React.js. I firmly believe that projects are the best way to transition from knowledge to excellency in any subject.
main.misc: I am fluent in English and Hindi. I also have working profiency in French, and am beginning to learn German. Übung macht den Meister!
main.contactmessage: Let's get in touch! Fill the form below to shoot me a message

education.degree: B.E Computer Science and MSc. Economics (Dual Major)

education.description: Class XII, CBSE: (PCM) 94.2%      Class X, CBSE: 10/10

work.company: The Mars Colonization project by Microsoft
work.title: Web Development
work.description: A part of Microsoft’s Engage 2020 program, the aim of the project was to find the shortest path intelligently between a mars rover and the destination, while avoiding obstacles. The project was hosted as a webpage on completion.

work.company: Sparse Distributed Memory using spiking neural networks and rank order codes
work.title: Spiking Neural Networks
work.description: The project aims to use the concepts of rank order encoding and spiking neural networks to build a spare distributed memory. A sparse distributed memory mechanism is expected to increase training speed of machine learning models. It also has applications in one-shot learning where available data is scarce.

work.title: Semantic Segmentation
work.description: Semantic segmentation for autonomous vehicles was done using UNet on the Cityscape Image Pairs dataset.

work.company: The Effect of Fiscal Policy on Investment
work.title: Panel Data Regression
work.description: This project evaluates the impact of fiscal policy components on private and public investment using data for a panel of fifteen emerging economies over the period 2009-2017. The within estimator and the two step System - GMM estimators have been employed for this data analysis in order to make useful inferences.

work.company: An analysis of Total Factor Productivity in OECD countries: A Neural Networks approach
work.title: Neural Networks
work.description: A part of Microsoft’s Engage 2020 program, the aim of the project was to find the shortest path intelligently between a mars rover and the destination, while avoiding obstacles. The project was hosted as a webpage on completion.

work.title: Chatbots
work.description: This project evaluates the impact of fiscal policy components on private and public investment using data for a panel of fifteen emerging economies over the period 2009-2017. The within estimator and the two step System - GMM estimators have been employed for this data analysis in order to make useful inferences.

work.title: Data Mining
work.description: The use of regression techniques was employed to find which government yojanas and healthcare schemes are effective in the country. The most infectious and dangerous diseases were also identified that hamper the health of the country.
